<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4992</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Sticks and Stones</string>
            <string language="es">Palos y piedras</string>
            <string language="ga">Maidí agus Clocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stöcke und Steine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Bâtons et pierres</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Varas e pedras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bastoni e pietre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραβδιά και πέτρες</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The class begins with a "round" where students describe times when others made them feel good about themselves. Worksheets are distributed containing a poem on Bullying and some questions for discussion in small groups.</string>
            <string language="es">La clase empieza con una “ronda” donde los estudiantes describen ocasiones en que otros les hicieron sentirse bien consigo mismos. Se distribuyen hojas de trabajo que contienen un poema sobre el acoso escolar y algunas cuestiones de las que hablar en pequ</string>
            <string language="ga">Tosaíonn an rang le “babhta” ina gcuireann na daltaí síos orthu féin nuair a mhothaigh siad go maith fúthu féin mar gheall ar dhaoine eile. Seachadtar billeoga oibre le dán faoi bhulaíocht agus roinnt ceisteanna le ple i ngrúpaí beaga.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SPHE</string>
            <string language="es">SPHE. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSPS</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kategorie fängt mit einem "rundem" an, wo 
Kursteilnehmer Zeiten beschreiben, als andere sie fühlen gut über 
selbst bildeten. Die Bogen werden ein Gedicht auf dem 
Tyrannisieren und einige Fragen für Diskussion in den kleinen Gruppen
enthalten verteilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La classe commence par un "rond" où les 
étudiants décrivent des périodes où d'autres ont rendu leur le 
sentir bon au sujet d'eux-mêmes. Des tableaux sont distribués 
contenant une poésie sur intimider et quelques questions pour la 
discussion dans de petits groupes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A classe começa com um "redondo" onde os 
estudantes descrevem as épocas em que outros fizeram lhes a 
sensação boa sobre se. As folhas são distribuídas que 
contêm um poema em bullying e algumas perguntas para a discussão em 
grupos pequenos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il codice categoria comincia con "un rotondo" 
dove gli allievi descrivono i periodi in cui altri hanno reso loro il 
tatto buon circa se stesso. I fogli di lavoro sono distribuiti 
che contengono un poem sul bullying ed alcune domande per la 
discussione nei piccoli gruppi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η κλάση αρχίζει με έναν "κύκλο" όπου οι σπουδαστές 
περιγράφουν τους χρόνους όταν τους έκαναν άλλοι το αγαθό 
αίσθησης για τους. Τα φύλλα εργασίας διανέμονται 
περιέχοντας ένα ποίημα στη φοβέρα και μερικές ερωτήσεις για τη 
συζήτηση στις μικρές ομάδες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">SPHE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
